mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_DELIVERY ( ORDER_NO , DELIVERY_FEE , DELIVERY_COMPANY , DISPATCH_DATE , DELIVERY_DATE ) VALUES ( #{ orderNo } , #{ deliveryFee } , #{ deliveryCompany } , NULL , NULL )
mapper.update: UPDATE TBL_STOCK SET STOCK_AMOUNT = STOCK_AMOUNT - #{ orderQuantity } WHERE STOCK_NO = (SELECT O.STOCK_NO FROM (SELECT A.STOCK_NO , A.STOCK_AMOUNT , MIN(A.STOCK_DATE) OLDEST , B.OPTION_NO FROM TBL_STOCK A LEFT JOIN TBL_OPTION B ON (A.STOCK_NO = B.REF_STOCK_NO) WHERE B.OPTION_NO = #{ optionNo } AND A.STOCK_AMOUNT > 0 AND ROWNUM = 1 GROUP BY A.STOCK_NO, B.OPTION_NO, A.STOCK_AMOUNT)O)
mapper.select: SELECT A.OPTION_NO , A.REF_PROD_NO , B.PROD_NAME , B.DISCOUNT_RATE , B.PROD_PRICE , C.BRAND_NAME , T.THUMBNAIL_PATH , A.OPT_BODY_COLOR , A.OPT_INK_COLOR , A.OPT_POINT_SIZE , A.OPT_EXTRA_CHARGE FROM TBL_OPTION A LEFT JOIN TBL_PRODUCT B ON(A.REF_PROD_NO = B.PROD_NO) LEFT JOIN TBL_BRAND C ON(C.BRAND_NO = B.BRAND_NO) LEFT JOIN TBL_ATTACHMENT T ON(B.PROD_NO = T.REF_PROD_NO) WHERE A.OPTION_NO = #{ optionNo }
